name: Wasabi Game
summary: This game was released by Studio Wasabi on March 9, 2018 from the Appstore and Googleplay. This game can be played with Studio Wasabi's previous releases "Toraware no Kan," "Ookami Game," and "Eve project You can play "Toraware no Kan", "Ookami Game", and "Eve project". More games will be added in the future.
